```{r 0-setup, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#regular
if(1){
  library(dplyr)
  library(data.table)
  library(ggplot2)
  library(cowplot)
  library(qqman)
  library(viridis)
  library(scales)
  library(tidyverse)
  library(ggcorrplot)
  
  #options
  options(bitmapType = "cairo")
  options(error = function() traceback(3))
  
  #seed
  set.seed(123)
  
  #loop count and data limit
  iter <- 50
  #ggplot holder list
  gg <- vector(mode='list', length=12)
  setwd('/data2/morgante_lab/nklimko/rep/dgrp-starve/')
}
```

The following methods are currently implemented:

- Mr. Mash

- GBLUP

- BayesC



```{r cor-female, warning=FALSE}

mash <- readRDS('snake/data/30_summary/mr.mash_f_top3.Rds')
bayesC <- readRDS('snake/data/30_summary/multibayesC_f_top3.Rds')
blup <- readRDS('snake/data/30_summary/multigblup_f_top3.Rds')
lasso <- readRDS('snake/data/30_summary/mlasso_f_top3.Rds')
datamash <- readRDS('snake/data/30_summary/datamash_f_top3.Rds')

allData <- list(mash, bayesC, blup, lasso, datamash)

#correlations----
hold <- 0
for(i in allData){
  raw <- unlist(i[1,])
  trim <- raw[seq(1, length(raw), by=16)]
  hold <- cbind(hold, trim)
}

corData <- hold[,-1]

#runtime----
hold <- 0
for(i in allData){
  raw <- unlist(i[2,])
  trim <- raw[seq(3, length(raw), by=5)]
  hold <- cbind(hold, trim)
}

timeData <- hold[,-1]

#graphing----
iter <- 50
label <- c(rep("mr.mash", iter), rep("bayesC", iter), rep("gblup", iter), rep("lasso", iter), rep("mash.dd", iter))
data <- data.table(cor=as.numeric(unlist(corData)), method=label)

gg[[1]] <- ggplot(data, aes(x=method, y=cor, fill=method)) +
  geom_violin(color = NA, width = 0.65) +
  geom_boxplot(color='#440154FF', width = 0.15) +
  theme_minimal() +
  stat_summary(fun=mean, color='#440154FF', geom='point', 
               shape=18, size=3, show.legend=FALSE) +
  labs(x=NULL,y='Correlation',tag='F') +
  theme(legend.position='none',
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = -45, size=10),
        text=element_text(size=10),
        plot.tag = element_text(size=15)) +
  scale_fill_viridis(begin = 0.4, end=0.9,discrete=TRUE)

data <- data.table(cor=as.numeric(unlist(timeData)), method=label)

gg[[2]] <- ggplot(data, aes(x=method, y=cor, fill=method)) +
  geom_violin(color = NA, width = 0.65) +
  geom_boxplot(color='#440154FF', width = 0.15) +
  theme_minimal() +
  stat_summary(fun=mean, color='#440154FF', geom='point', 
               shape=18, size=3, show.legend=FALSE) +
  labs(x=NULL,y='Runtime',tag='F') +
  theme(legend.position='none',
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = -45, size=10),
        text=element_text(size=10),
        plot.tag = element_text(size=15)) +
  scale_fill_viridis(begin = 0.4, end=0.9,discrete=TRUE)


```
